Authors:
Luis A Parra, Jean-Marc Moncalvo, Jun Liang Zhou, Y Tan,
Meng Lin Xu, Bo Wang, Rui Lin Zhao
Title:
A reexamination of Allopsalliota indicates synonymy with
Micropsalliota (Agaricaceae, Agaricales, Basidiomycota)
Abstract:
The monotypic genus Allopsalliota (Agaricaceae,
Agaricales, Basidiomycota) was created to accommodate Allopsalliota
geesterani, originally described as Agaricus geesterani. After
reexamination of this species based on both morphological characters and
molecular phylogenetic evidence, we conclude that Allopsalliota should
be considered a synonym of Micropsalliota, and we propose the transfer
of Allopsalliota geesterani into Micropsalliota.
